game.shortDescription: Street racing meets car combat. Inspired by Blur, NFS:U, Midnight Club and other 2000s arcade racers. Take on fierce rivals in an intense street racing league, either solo or in local multiplayer (splitscreen). Bolts, shockwaves, mines and other race tech at your disposal. Trust me, you'll need it.
